name: Journey to Arcadia (Peter Sutarjo)
description:
72-hour GameJam hosted by Berklee College of Music. 

Worked in a team of 4 total. I focused on level design and visual effects. I plan to add two more levels by the end of this year and finish implementing some of the core mechanics. Current incomplete game is downloadable.

GitHub Repo: https://github.com/OperativeRevan/BerkleeGameJam
